conversation.content: Um, hi, sorry, I'm just, uh, really confused here, got charged twice for the, um, what's it called... the CEU training thing?
Mmm. Let me, um... pull that up. Account?
Yeah it's, uh, sorry, lemme find it... ACC-4428-N I think?
Got it, so um, I'm seeing account ACC-4428-NV here and, er, let me just... okay there's the training materials, uh, looking at the charges now... hmm... give me just a sec to dig into this.
Sorry I just, um, I shoulda checked better but saw two charges, same amount.

No no, totally fine, so um, I see what you're... wait, no that's... sorry, let me check the other—actually yeah, there's two charges here, both for $89.99, transaction IDs TRX-8827-ML and TRX-8827-MK.
Right! See? Um, that's what I mean, and like, I only bought one course!
Checking the, uh... the timestamps here...
I mean I've been buying from you guys for, um, three years now, never had this happen.
So these are, um, both from yesterday at... that's 2:14 PM and then, er, 2:16 PM, so like really close together, which usually means, uh, hmm, sometimes the system does this thing where...
Wait so um, did I click twice? God I'm such an idiot if I—
Actually no, um, looking at the logs here, reference REF-2024-77821, it shows just one, er, one click-through but the payment processor, uh, it pinged twice.
Oh! So not my fault? Sorry I just, um, felt so stupid calling about this.
Definitely not you, so um, what I'm gonna do is, er, process a refund for that duplicate, should I use the card ending in, uh, let me confirm... 4429?
Um yeah that's, that's right, the Visa one.
Perfect. Got it.
How long til I, um, til I see it back?
So the refund request RFD-9987-QZ2 is, um, processing now and typically it's, er, three to five business days but sometimes, uh, sometimes faster depending on your bank.
Okay good, sorry again for the, um, the hassle, just needed my money back.

No hassle at all, so um, you should get an email confirmation in about, er, five minutes with all the details, reference number REF-2024-77822, and uh, is there anything else I can help you with today?

scenario: ultrasound tech, confused about a duplicate charge for online training materials
